import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Hamburger from '../Hamburger' import Style from '../../styles/layout/layout.module.css' import Link from 'next/link' import {useRouter} from 'next/router' import th from '../../public/locales/th/navbar.json' import en from '../../public/locales/en/navbar.json' const Navbar = ({ isSidebar, setIsSidebar }) => { const {locale, pathname} = useRouter() const [language, setLanguage] = useState("en") const [innerWidth, setInnerWidth] = useState(0) let t = locale == "en"? en: th useEffect(() => { setInnerWidth(window.innerWidth) }, []) return (
{innerWidth >= 961 ?

{t.titleDesktop}

:

{t.titleMobile}

}
  • {t.home}
  • {t.menu}
  • {t.delivery}
  • {t.contact}
{ language == "en"? setLanguage("th")} >TH : setLanguage("en")}>EN }
) } export default Navbar
